description: Modifies an existing Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.

parameters.name: SubscriptionName
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description: The type of source that is generating the events. For example, if you want to be notified of events generated by an instance, set this parameter to db-instance. If this value is not specified, all events are returned. Valid values: db-instance, db-parameter-group, db-security-group.

parameters.name: EventCategories
parameters.description: A list of event categories for a SourceType that you want to subscribe to. (string) ---

nested_items.name: EventSubscription
nested_items.description: Detailed information about an event to which you have subscribed.

nested_items.name: CustomerAwsId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services customer account that is associated with the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: CustSubscriptionId
nested_items.description: The Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription ID.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicArn
nested_items.description: The topic ARN of the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionCreationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription was created.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The source type for the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: SourceIdsList
nested_items.description: A list of source IDs for the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: EventCategoriesList
nested_items.description: A list of event categories for the Amazon DocumentDB event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the subscription is enabled. A value of true indicates that the subscription is enabled.

nested_items.name: EventSubscriptionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the event subscription.
